entries.femaleVariant: I said no.
They'll have my head for this...
Then you shall perish for a good cause.
The program is still in the trial phase. We cannot take it to market as-is!
We shall see soon enough.
Sorry to make you wait. Business… can be stupid.
Mmhm, I can get to work on that... Just one condition.
Bedroom. Nightstand.
Very nice... But come here already.
<mothertongue l="jpn" m="Warui-ko-me" b="" a=", I missed this, you."/>
Alarm firmware's fresh, buuut… saw excited birds chirpin' on a BBS. Somethin' about lots of seeds fallin' through the sieve.
Automated turrets. Latest scanner model... Systems all connected to the server...
Shit, cameras packed with newtech – motion sensors, heat sig activators, IFF.
Mmhm. Looks like all their security systems are linked to the hotel subnet.
Right, here's the plan. We use the Flathead to pierce their central server.
We need the Flathead. No other way to shut down these systems.
But I--
Make yourself comfortable. I need a minute to finish.
I've got an idea. Be right back.
Noted. Enough.
Mmh, it wasn't long. Not even long enough for me to grow bored.
A moment. It will pass.
I know.
Loaded, safety's on. Good to know, though. Once you're in there, don't forget about that iron.
Just a sec, looking for the perfect thing... Oh, you'll like this.
You skilled enough to kill it all?
Mucho more than enough. Just need access to their subnet.
Can you shut 'em off?
Externally? No way. Gotta get in, check out how they link into the system first.
Lemme generate keys, I can forge their sigs.
I create a connection, wreak some havoc. Should be enough.
Can't get around them ourselves?
Nope. Least I'm fresh out of ideas.
Please speak with your father. He's taken a particular interest in this project, he can certainly explain the risks invol--
My father is a tired, visionless old greybeard who thinks nothing will change and he'll live forever in his tiny, frozen bubble!
Read the documentation carefully. The Relic REQUIRES specific storage conditions. You MUST provide them.
We have not seen eye to eye for the past twenty years. I am quite sure we won't now.
Yorinobu's PDA. Could be something important on there.
Manual details a special temp-controlled container.
Heard that? Relic docs gotta be around here somewhere. Look for them.
Scan's showing a lower temp. Gotta be a cooler of some sort.
Right, grabbed the heat sig. Matches the spec in the docs.
Mhm. We got it. Good work.
OK, switch on thermal layer detection in the editor.
Hmm, pretty sure you caught the heat signatures we need back there.
Looks like we got everything we need.
"Clouds?" That a club of some sort?
Hm, same guy Yorinobu was yakkin' with at the start.
Beef between 'em's pretty clear. Either Yorinobu wants the throne, or Saburo's planning to disown him. Or both.
Wait, just checked. Get this – Yorinobu's got no position at Arasaka, not even on the payroll.
Hellman wants the Relic back something bad. And not just 'cause he's squirt-shittin' at the thought of Saburo.
Worked on it himself. I dunno, think it could be personal?
So – chip's gotta stay in the freezer?
Yep. Could damage it otherwise.
Should be easier to spot where Yorinobu's keeping the chip.
Let's take another look.
Yorinobu's got the case here, guaranteed.
Quit outta the editor.
Mhm. Think exes – exclusive, extravagant, excessive. Tech-heavy escort agency for the rich and bored.
Is everything... all right? You seem tense, edgy…
YOU wish to make demands of ME?
Only one. Focus. On me.
Oh, got any candy left? Stuff was preeetty fun last time.
Hearin' a drone – ventilation and cooling? Servers, gotta be.
Fancy doodads in here need to be controlled.
Light's givin' off heat. Standard stuff.
Gotta learn to ignore the mundane.
I should not even be listening to such things.
You will listen to this – Saburo is an addled despot utterly removed from reality, stuck in some fossilized vision of a world that no longer exists! Of a world that may never have existed!
Somethin' to look forward to.
Oooh, Donaghy's. Looks like Mr. Arasaka had something to celebrate.
Really think you'll find the chip in there?
Just a fancy-ass fridge.
Temp doesn't match the guidelines. Won't find a thing there.
Air conditioning. Standard model for hotels of this caliber.
Temp matches that stipulated in the docs. But no way the chip's hiding there.
No way. Temp's too low, could fluctuate. Nice try, though.
Relic needs to be kept real cool.
Clouds targets celebs, high-ranking corpos, high-rolling mercs, business dicks and cunts…
So the chip biz is definitely a rogue move on his part.
Too risky – temp fluctuations, risk of damage.
Already found those docs. Look somewhere else.
All right, V – eyes open. Gotta find out where Yorinobu's keepin' the Relic.
Wow, champagne's decent. The taste boosted somehow?
No. Just the price. Same bubbly you'll be sippin' in realspace soon.
Hm, smells like...
Evelyn... She... I felt her fear.
Oooh, this BD's starting to get pretty adult.
Oh fuck – it's like I'm really...
Hm, hung up. Go back to when they first start talking. Need to hear the whole thing.
One more time, rewind. Didn't catch all that.
Listen in on that conversation, V. Could be something important.
Yep. Cedarwood, black pepper, benzoin, vetiver...
Yeah, yeah, those. Shit, that's his cologne!
V. Eye on the prize, focus.
Sure got it under control quick, too.
No, wait, that-- That was... disappointing. Weird.
entries.maleVariant: No, wait. That was... disappointing. Weird.

entries.femaleVariant: Is it, though?
You look like a cut of fuckable meat. Are you?
